channel.title: Anyway to take weather away from pimpscape
channel.description: Hey, anyway to take weather FULLY AWAY? Because i got pimpscape and it just keeps snowing and dust is there anyway to take it away? it makes serever lag badly

item.title: Anyway to take weather away from pimpscape
item.dc:creator: @Tensai Tensai
item.description:
@Tensai wrote:

You could try ::nosnow,

Or, you can make your own command, and link it to whatever void it is for snowing, and tag on false;

Read full topic
item.source: Anyway to take weather away from pimpscape
